about_the_game:
Lost Glitches puts the “T” back in TCG!

Published by Mimunga and developed by the award-winning indie games company, Honig Studios, this TCG+RPG hybrid allows you to collect cards with unique abilities, build your decks, and dive into engaging modes with stylized graphics and captivating gameplay.

Immerse Yourself in a Cyberpunk World

Step into a beautifully designed cyberpunk universe where tech optimism reigns supreme. The Lost Glitches offers a unique blend of trading card game mechanics and RPG elements. TLG - as we call it - is perfect for trading card enthusiasts and fans of coding and hacking culture. In the near future the game will allow for true ownership and player-to-player trading. But let’s level up together first.

Strategic Depth and Fair Progression

Enjoy a fair and enjoyable progression system that lets you build a competitive card collection while engaging in RPG-style character development. Collect new cards, enhance your character's abilities, and experience pure strategic fun. Each match is a testament to your strategic prowess and tactical decisions, ensuring every victory is earned through skill, not luck.

Skill-Based Mastery

The Lost Glitches rewards true TCG enthusiasts who take pride in their strategic brilliance. Outthink and outmaneuver your opponents in matches that highlight your expertise. Experience the satisfaction of mastering a game that values your skill over chance. The Lost Glitches delivers for both Pilots and Builders alike!

Unmatched Stunning Art

Prepare to be amazed by the breathtaking visuals crafted by artists from top AAA studios. Each card, character, VFX, SFX, and animation is meticulously designed to enhance the immersive cyberpunk experience. Dive into a world where every element is a masterpiece, offering unmatched visual pleasure.

Unlimited Creative Freedom

With no restrictions on matching different syndicates, The Lost Glitches offers limitless opportunities for diverse strategies and creative deck-building. Combine unique abilities and characters from various factions to craft the ultimate deck. Whether you prefer aggressive tactics, defensive maneuvers, or intricate combos, the game allows you TIMMY’s, JOHNNY's and SPIKE’s to dominate the battlefield with your strategic imagination.

A Collector's Paradise with True Ownership

We are working on an experience that will allow true ownership of assets earned through play. The Lost Glitches is a treasure trove for collectors, offering rare cards and exclusive cosmetics. When we enter full release, you will be able to dive into the thrill of opening booster packs and build your legendary collection with powerful cards, stunning artwork, and limited-edition items.

Start Your Journey

Join the community of passionate players and embark on your journey in The Lost Glitches today. Whether you're chasing the rarest cards or customizing your deck with unique cosmetics, the excitement and rewards are endless. Discover the thrill of true strategic mastery in a captivating cyberpunk world!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 or later
  • Processor: both Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 or later
  • Processor: both Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5830 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
